title: KFC786
author: KFC786
content: PALAESTINE is a sacred county for Muslims and Jews too as they believe. But actually they are Zionist and also they are murderers as you can see social media. I am surprised that this is a first time a whole world is supporting PALAESTINE because they know reality. We should fight with these jew Zionist and make them pay. And I hope as Muslim our heart burn to ground after seeing such horrific deaths of our young brothers and sisters. I am tired of ruling America and we should make them pay.

comments.author: JunkieMiner
comments.body: Quote from: KFC786 on November 16, 2023, 02:57:58 AMPALAESTINE is a sacred county for Muslims and Jews too as they believe. But actually they are Zionist and also they are murderers as you can see social media. I am surprised that this is a first time a whole world is supporting PALAESTINE because they know reality. We should fight with these jew Zionist and make them pay. And I hope as Muslim our heart burn to ground after seeing such horrific deaths of our young brothers and sisters. I am tired of ruling America and we should make them pay. The problem is that no Muslim country is taking the side of the Palestine and all the innocent people are killed by these Israel. But we also can't help them as per our governments we are completely attached to our governments and still we don't go their and can't have any possible opportunities' to help them in their difficult situation they are facing now. But we can only make the media alive and we can also raise voice for them through the social media and make all the World to speak against this matter and find a way to get rid of the cruel ones.

comments.author: Y3shot
comments.body: I hate war because during war it is the common citizens that will fall victim and be in pains, the politicians won't be affected because they already have security men who will secure them and their wife but as for the common people from both sides they will be seriously affected. I'm not in support of war no matter where the fault is coming from. Humans don't deserve war, it is only people are tired of life that will prefer to go for war.

comments.author: odolvlobo
comments.body: I understand that the conflict is a vestige of Western colonialism and has been going on for 75 years now. I have no solutions to offer and my uninformed opinions have no value, so other than stating my belief that killing people is never a path to resolution, I keep my mouth shut.

comments.author: kaka_Shipai
comments.body: Its not a war btw. The definition of war is different. A situation, where someone is deprived of their land, and then over time tortured and killed, and then killing them for fun, making tiktok videos, is it a war situation. I thought in a war, both the sides fight but here only one side is killing and the other side is getting killed.

comments.author: BabyBandit
comments.created_time: January 13, 2024, 09:53:02 AMLast edit: January 13, 2024, 10:12:43 AM by BabyBandit
comments.body: Quote from: KFC786 on November 16, 2023, 02:57:58 AMPALAESTINE is a sacred county for Muslims and Jews too as they believe. But actually they are Zionist and also they are murderers as you can see social media. I am surprised that this is a first time a whole world is supporting PALAESTINE because they know reality. We should fight with these jew Zionist and make them pay. And I hope as Muslim our heart burn to ground after seeing such horrific deaths of our young brothers and sisters. I am tired of ruling America and we should make them pay. Go out and do it then instead of just talk behind a monitor. It always two sides of a story but often when you have emotion in it, you only look at one side of the coin.Hamas is a terrorist organization and all the economic contribution they get from the world if they used that money to buy food for example for their people instead of bombs it would be much better but they don't want that.But now they won't get any more money and people have stop support them and I am so happy for that, they have to to what the rest of the world does take care of themselves! Now with YouTube and alternative media and everything lie's don't work anymore. Everyone can see what happens with their own eyes. I hope Hamas get defeated so the good powers in Palestine get in control of the country and yes I pray for peace but Hamas don't want peace they want death and war. And I don't take any side here, fuck both sides. I am all for peace, we living in 2024 not 1935 but some parts of middle east seems to be 100 years behind the rest of the world. It's sad, so sad. Because middle east is such an amazing area and have amazing food and good people, but sadly the evil is in power over there.Let's pray for peace all over the world. This is not how the world should look like with war, we have evolved and moved away from such shit many years ago.This is my personal opinions so I hope nobody get angry or sad because I share them since it's a sensitive subject.

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: You don't need a middleman to talk to God, religion is one of the many roots of evil. And if you feel bad for Palestine or Israel, go fight for whoever you support, adding a flag on social media or posting on a crypto forum won't do anything and it is a waste of time.

May Allah protect

comments.author: spectre71
comments.body: Hamas started the fight, you can't cry foul when your getting your ass kicked. Their blood is on their hands.The solution was simple, hand back the hostages, they didn't do it.The Palestinians provide the petri dish that grows and supports hamas. They need to clean up their own mess and take out the trash. They are not even close to "innocent"Name on thing the Palestinians/Hamas has contributed to mankind in the last 100 years? 200?Nothing. Garbage people.
